name: unified-repo-analyzer
description: A comprehensive tool for analyzing code repositories, generating executive summaries and technical breakdowns

scripts.dev: echo "Please run backend and frontend separately in different terminals:" && echo "Terminal 1: bun run dev:backend" && echo "Terminal 2: bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: bun run --cwd packages/backend dev || npm run dev --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/backend
scripts.dev:frontend: bun run --cwd packages/frontend dev || npm run dev --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/frontend
scripts.dev:cli: bun run --cwd packages/cli dev || npm run dev --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/cli
scripts.build:legacy: bun run build:shared && bun run build:backend && bun run build:cli && bun run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: bun run --cwd packages/backend build || npm run build --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/backend
scripts.build:frontend: bun run --cwd packages/frontend build || npm run build --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/frontend
scripts.build:cli: bun run --cwd packages/cli build || npm run build --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/cli
scripts.build:shared: bun run --cwd packages/shared build || npm run build --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/shared
scripts.test:all: bun run --cwd packages/backend test || npm run test --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/backend && bun run --cwd packages/frontend test || npm run test --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/frontend && bun run --cwd packages/cli test || npm run test --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/cli && bun run --cwd packages/shared test || npm run test --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/shared
scripts.clean: bun run --cwd packages/backend clean || npm run clean --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/backend && bun run --cwd packages/frontend clean || npm run clean --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/frontend && bun run --cwd packages/cli clean || npm run clean --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/cli && bun run --cwd packages/shared clean || npm run clean --workspace @unified-repo-analyzer/shared
scripts.postinstall: echo "Dependencies installed successfully. Run 'bun run build' to build the project."
scripts.deploy:prod: bun run build:prod && bun run docker:build && bun run docker:up

author: Unified Repository Analyzer Contributors
